DOC.brief_title: EMBA Peripheral Embolization Device ( `` EPED '' ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: This study FIM , open label , prospective , single center , non-randomized , evaluation EMBA Medical Peripheral Embolization Device ( PED ) use arterial venous embolization peripheral vasculature .
